locations

Here are the places where you can catch people playing Super Smash Brothers Melee for the Nintendo Gamecube, Super Smash Brothers Project M for the Nintendo Wii, Super Smash Brothers for Wii U for the Wii U, and other Smash games. Please don't be a dick: The locations here aren't for you to barge in, break the provided controllers, and leave with 50 pounds of shit on the ground. Treat them with courtesy and common sense, wrap up controllers and turn off the system when you leave.

Hover over each location for a description, or click the little map icon to show it on Google Maps (Shows the exact region of the building the place is located, so now you don't get lost!).
